dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 674 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gutierrez (for himself and Ms. Corrine Brown of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.

section.header: Repeal of sunset provision for advisory committee on minority veterans
section.text: Subsection (e) of section 544 of title 38, United States Code, is repealed.
